New Records: Denmark extended their streak of 13 straight undefeated home games in the UEFA Nations League
Key Match Events: Yussuf Poulsen scored the second goal with a bicycle kick
Albert Gronbaek scored the first goal after VAR scrutiny
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark had a strong start following their first winless European Championship in 24 years
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark's victory marked their fourth win in five head-to-heads against Serbia
Miscellaneous Highlights: Serbia's fourth defeat in 20 UNL games
Denmark's position at the top of Group A4
